alert.note: Alert for Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 5:49PM EDT until August 10 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following county, Letcher. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1.8 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Whitesburg, Fleming-Neon, Mayking, Thornton, Wright, Winters, Sergent, Millstone, Farraday, Colly, Seco, Whitaker, Craftsville, Ermine, Neon Junction, Chip, Tolliver Town, Cromona, Haymond and Horn. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
